meanings.definition: Consisting of a single type of polymer.
meanings.sent1: The homopolymeric material was made of only one kind of polymer.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the homopolymeric substance under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The homopolymeric plastic was so pure, it sparkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her homopolymeric artwork was as uniform as a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The homopolymeric structure of the molecule was like a perfectly aligned row of soldiers.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a polymer composed of identical monomers.
meanings.sent1: The homopolymeric chain was formed by linking identical monomers together.
meanings.sent2: The lab used homopolymeric compounds in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The homopolymeric solution bubbled like a fizzy drink in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: The homopolymeric bond between them was unbreakable, like a strong friendship.
meanings.sent5: The homopolymeric structure resembled a perfectly aligned row of colorful building blocks.
